mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T06_PER_HISTORY ( NO , PER_NO , EVENT_TYPE , EVENT_DATE , EVENT_TIME , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , TITLE , COVER_IMAGE , PRAISE , IS_PUBLIC , REMARKS , DEL_FLG , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , LAST_USER , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{No} , #{PerNo} , #{EventType} , #{EventDate} , #{EventTime} , #{Latitude} , #{Longitude} , #{Title} , #{CoverImage} , #{Praise} , #{IsPublic} , #{Remarks} , #{DelFlg} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} , #{LastUser} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T06_PER_HISTORY SET NO = #{No} , PER_NO = #{PerNo} , EVENT_TYPE = #{EventType} , EVENT_DATE = #{EventDate} , EVENT_TIME = #{EventTime} , LATITUDE = #{Latitude} , LONGITUDE = #{Longitude} , TITLE = #{Title} , COVER_IMAGE = #{CoverImage} , PRAISE = #{Praise} , IS_PUBLIC = #{IsPublic} , REMARKS = #{Remarks} , DEL_FLG = #{DelFlg} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} , LAST_USER = #{LastUser} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "No" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , EVENT_TYPE AS "EventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "EventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "EventTime" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , TITLE AS "Title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "CoverImage" , PRAISE AS "Praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "IsPublic" , REMARKS AS "Remarks" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{ID}

SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "No" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , EVENT_TYPE AS "EventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "EventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "EventTime" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , TITLE AS "Title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "CoverImage" , PRAISE AS "Praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "IsPublic" , REMARKS AS "Remarks" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ID = #{ID} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "ID" , NO AS "No" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , EVENT_TYPE AS "EventType" , EVENT_DATE AS "EventDate" , EVENT_TIME AS "EventTime" , LATITUDE AS "Latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "Longitude" , TITLE AS "Title" , COVER_IMAGE AS "CoverImage" , PRAISE AS "Praise" , IS_PUBLIC AS "IsPublic" , REMARKS AS "Remarks" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T06_PER_HISTORY WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
